name: Shien's Daredevil
text: When this card is Normal Summoned: Place 1 Bushido Counter on it (max. 1). This card gains 300 ATK while it has a Bushido Counter on it. Once per turn: You can target 1 face-up card on the field that you can place a Bushido Counter on; remove 1 Bushido Counter from this card, then place it on that target.
